level.heading: Registered agent as agent for service; service when no registered agent.
Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1605(a) of Fiscal Year 2003 Budget Support Amendment Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-544, December 4, 2002, 49 DCR 11700).

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1605(a) of the Fiscal Year 2003 Budget Support Amendment Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-27, February 24, 2003, 50 DCR 2151).

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1605(a) of Fiscal Year 2003 Budget Support Amendment Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-103, June 20, 2003, 50 DCR 5499).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-138
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-138, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 29A-1001.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29A-101.01.
